summary: A restaurant employee wanted for murder contracts Ebola by raping a woman in South Africa and starts an outbreak there and in Hong Kong when he returns home.
cast: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Yeung-Ming Wan|Fui-On Shing|Tsui-Ling Wong|Miu-Ying Chan|Meng Lo|Lu Cheung|Edward Corbett|Lorraine Ho|Cheung-Lung Kai|Lori Shannon|Michael Tam|Bobby Yip|Sin-Yi Yip
title: Yi boh lai beng duk
